document_data.caption: A map showing the Street of Delights in north Zhentil Keep.
document_data.name: Street of Delights
document_data.mainbody: The '''Street of Delights''' was a small road located in the city of [[Zhentil Keep]] during the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: The Street of Delights was located in the [[Zhentil Keep/Common Quarter|Common Quarter]] in northern Zhentil Keep. The street travelled east to west roughly parallel to the wall separating the [[Zhentil Keep/Inner Quarter|Inner Quarter]] from the Common Quarter. The Street of Delight originated on [[Wizards' Way]] in the west and terminated on [[Electrum Avenue]] in the east.
document_data.Notable Locations: The [[Cloven Ogre]], which was a tavern popular amoung the [[Zhentilar]], was located on the Street of Delights.
